text.ラストスパートで中団以降にいると\\n持久力を少し使って加速力を上げる\\n中山: Acceleration +0,4m/s², Current HP +1,5% for 1.5s when: Long AND Betweener AND Last spurt AND In trailing 60% AND At Nakayama Acceleration +0,4m/s², Current HP -2% for 1.5s when: Long AND Betweener AND Last spurt AND In trailing 60%
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき後方にいると\\n速度が上がり持久力をわずかに\\n回復す: Target Speed +0,35m/s, Current HP +1,5% for 2.4s when: Medium AND Middle leg later half (random) AND In trailing 50% OR Long AND Middle leg later half (random) AND In trailing 50%
text.レース中盤に中団で競り合うと持久力が\\n少し回復し、さらに速度がすごく上がり\: Target Speed +0,15m/s to 0 closest undefined, Target Speed +0,3m/s, Current HP +3,5% for 3s when: Medium AND Middle leg AND In leading 80% AND In trailing 70% AND Blocked (side) for ≥2s
text.スピードとパワーが十分に強いと\\nスピードとパワーがすごく上がる\\n＜マイル: Speed stat +80, Power stat +80 indefinitely when: base_speed >= 1000 AND base_power >= 1000 AND Mile OR base_speed >= 1000 AND base_power >= 1000 AND Medium
text.最終コーナーで中団以降だと前後3人\\nずつの速度をわずかに下げ、自分\\nの速: Target Speed +0,45m/s, Current Speed -0,15m/s to Betweeners ahead, Current Speed -0,15m/s to Betweeners behind for 1.8s when: Betweener AND In trailing 60% AND is_finalcorner_random == 1
text.レース終盤に後方で追い抜こうとすると\\n加速力を上げ、さらに目の前のウマ娘を\: Acceleration +0,4m/s², Current Speed -0,15m/s to Runners ahead for 2s when: Short AND Final leg or later AND In trailing 50% AND Overtaking OR Mile AND Final leg or later AND In trailing 50% AND Overtaking
text.最終コーナー前の第3コーナーで\\n前の方にいるとすごく前に出る\\n＜マイル/: Current Speed (natural decel) +0,45m/s for 3s when: Mile AND Corner 3 (random) AND In leading 50% OR Medium AND Corner 3 (random) AND In leading 50%
text.レース中盤にしばらくの間速度が上がる\\n＜マイル/中距離＞: Target Speed +0,35m/s for 4s when: Mile AND Middle leg \n(random) OR Medium AND Middle leg (random) \n
text.スタート時にしばらくの間\\n加速力が上がる＜作戦・逃げ＞: Acceleration +0,4m/s² for 4s when: Runner AND Opening leg \n
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき前方にいると\\n速度が上がり、さらに加速力が\\nわずか: Target Speed +0,35m/s, Acceleration +0,2m/s² for 2.4s when: Short AND Middle leg later half (random) AND In leading 50%
text.レース終盤始めの方で中団以降にいると\\n加速力が上がる、2200m～2400m: Acceleration +0,5m/s², Current HP -2% for 1.8s when: Medium AND course_distance >= 2200 AND course_distance <= 2400 AND phase_firstquarter_random == 2 AND In trailing 60% Acceleration +0,4m/s² for 1.8s when: Medium AND course_distance < 2200 AND Final leg first half (random) AND In trailing 60% OR Medium AND course_distance > 2400 AND Final leg first half (random) AND In trailing 60%
text.終盤が迫ったとき前の方にいると速度が\\n少し上がり、加速力が少し上がる\\n2: Target Speed +0,35m/s, Acceleration +0,3m/s² for 3s when: Medium AND Leader AND Middle leg later half (random) AND In leading 50% AND course_distance == 2400 Target Speed +0,25m/s, Acceleration +0,3m/s² for 3s when: Medium AND Leader AND Middle leg later half (random) AND In leading 50% AND course_distance != 2400
text.最終コーナーで前の方にいると\\n速度が上がる、さらに短距離レースなら\\nわず: Target Speed +0,35m/s, Current Speed (natural decel) +0,15m/s for 1.8s when: Short AND Leader AND is_finalcorner_random == 1 AND In leading 50% Target Speed +0,35m/s for 1.8s when: Short AND Leader AND is_finalcorner_random == 1 AND In leading 50%
text.レース終盤始めの方で前方にいると\\n加速力が上がり、その後残り200m地点\\: Acceleration +0,4m/s² for 1.8s when: Leader AND Final leg first half (random) AND In leading 50% Target Speed +0,15m/s for 3s when: is_activate_other_skill_detail == 1 AND Remaining distance ≤201m AND Remaining distance ≥199m
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき前方にいると\\n速度がすごく上がる＜ダート＞: Target Speed +0,45m/s for 2.4s when: Dirt AND Middle leg \nlater half (random) AND In leading 50% \n
text.パワーが十分に強いとスピードがすごく\\n上がりパワーが十二分に仕上がっている\: Speed stat +100 indefinitely when: Dirt AND base_power >= 1200 Speed stat +80 indefinitely when: Dirt AND base_power >= 1000 AND base_power < 1200
text.レース中盤に競り合うと\\n速度がすごく上がる＜ダート＞: Target Speed +0,45m/s for 2.4s when: Dirt AND Middle leg \nAND Blocked (side) for ≥2s \n
text.前のウマ娘のすぐ後ろに付けると\\nしばらくの間速度が上がる＜ダート＞: Target Speed +0,35m/s for 4s when: Dirt AND 5s passed AND \nBehind an uma for 3s \n
text.レース中盤に大きく差をつけて先頭に\\nいたとき、最終直線で先頭だと速度が\\n: Target Speed +0,55m/s for 2.4s when: Runner AND is_last_straight == 1 AND Position 1 AND At Tokyo AND Medium after: Middle leg AND ≥3 length(s) ahead AND Position 1 Target Speed +0,45m/s for 2.4s when: Runner AND is_last_straight == 1 AND Position 1 after: Middle leg AND ≥3 length(s) ahead AND Position 1
text.レース中にスキルを13回発動すると\\nしばらくの間前に出る＜中距離＞: Current Speed (natural decel) +0,35m/s for 4s when: \nMedium AND Use ≥13 skills \n
text.レース中盤に中団以降にいると\\n持久力をすごく回復する\\n＜作戦・差し＞: Current HP +7,5% immediately when: Betweener AND Middle \nleg (random) AND In trailing 60% \n
text.レース中盤に中団にいると\\nしばらくの間速度が上がる\\n＜作戦・差し＞: Target Speed +0,35m/s for 4s when: Betweener AND Middle \nleg (random) AND In trailing 60% AND In leading 90% \n
text.レース中盤に先頭にいると\\n速度がすごく上がる\\n＜作戦・逃げ＞: Target Speed +0,45m/s for 3s when: Runner AND Middle leg \n(random) AND Position 1 \n
text.レース中盤にスキルを多く発動して\\n先頭にいるとき速度がすごく上がる: Target Speed +0,45m/s for 3s when: Use \n≥3 skills (mid) AND Position 1 \n
